/* etc.mng.help.getList */ SELECT A.idx ,A.sbjt ,A.cat ,B.cat_nm ,to_char(A.reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_dt ,to_char(A.updt_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') updt_dt ,A.reg_user_id ,A.updt_user_id ,USR.name reg_user_name FROM kcgbd.t_help_mng A ,kcgbd.t_category_mng B ,kcgbd.t_user USR WHERE 1=1 AND A.cat = B.idx AND USR.user_id = A.reg_user_id
AND A.cat = #{search_cat}

/* etc.mng.help.getInfo */ SELECT A.idx ,A.sbjt ,A.cat ,B.cat_nm ,A.ctnt ,to_char(A.reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_dt ,to_char(A.updt_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') updt_dt ,A.reg_user_id ,A.updt_user_id ,USR.name reg_user_name FROM kcgbd.t_help_mng A ,kcgbd.t_category_mng B ,kcgbd.t_user USR WHERE 1=1 AND A.cat = B.idx AND USR.user_id = A.reg_user_id AND A.idx = #{idx}

/* etc.mng.help.getCategoryList */ SELECT A.idx ,A.cat_nm ,to_char(A.reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_dt ,to_char(A.updt_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') updt_dt ,A.reg_user_id ,A.updt_user_id FROM kcgbd.t_category_mng A WHERE 1=1
AND A.cat_nm = #{cat_nm}

/* etc.mng.help.getCategoryInfo */ SELECT A.idx ,A.cat_nm ,to_char(A.reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_dt ,to_char(A.updt_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') updt_dt ,A.reg_user_id ,A.updt_user_id FROM kcgbd.t_category_mng A WHERE idx = #{idx}
